abstracts.cdata!:
The operation provides further support
            to Colombia's medium-term, growth-oriented, structural
            adjustment program by: (i) deepening reforms in the
            macroeconomic, trade and public investment areas; and (ii)
            reducing trade and sectoral distortions in agriculture.
            These efforts are expected to provide a sounder basis for
            export-oriented growth. The reviews in the context of the
            loan assist in monitoring the economic program and in
            promoting the participation of the external financial
            community in the program. The Trade and Agricultural Policy
            Loan Project will: (a) support trade liberalization; (b)
            rationalize trade and price intervention policies in
            agriculture; and (c) support coffee policy in balancing the
            incentives between coffee and non-coffee agriculture. It
            will furthermore; (d) support reforms to improve
            agricultural credit availability at more realistic interest
            rates; and (e) review efficiency in public investments in
            the agricultural and rural sectors, and provide
            institutional support to the Ministry of Agriculture.
